svg.text: Top-Down Perspective with Spatially-Embedded Three-Domain Annotations

g.text: σ ∈ G_ε | "This is what I wanted"
Annotations spatially positioned at each terrain layer

svg.text: Each terrain layer embeds its three-domain ontology locally: Golf metaphor (left),
Mathematical formalism (center), and LLM implementation (right) converge at goal g.
